00027 #include <Inventor/SoPath.h>
00028 
00029 class COIN_DLL_API SoFullPath : public SoPath {
00030   typedef SoPath inherited;
00031   friend class SoTempPath;
00032 
00033 private:
00034   SoFullPath(const int approxLength);
00035   virtual ~SoFullPath(void);
00036 
00037 public:
00038   void pop(void);
00039   SoNode * getTail(void) const;
00040   SoNode * getNodeFromTail(const int index) const;
00041   int getIndexFromTail(const int index) const;
00042   int getLength(void) const;
00043 };
00044 
00045 // inline methods
00046 
00047 inline void
00048 SoFullPath::pop(void)
00049 {
00050   this->truncate(this->nodes.getLength() - 1);
00051 }
00052
